introduction.title: Our Mission
introduction.content: In this era of surging AI waves, we are working hard to transform AI application development from intuition and luck-dependent 'alchemy' into a testable, iterable, and optimizable 'engineering'. We believe that successful AI systems do not rely solely on powerful models, but on the sophisticated management and application of 'context' behind them.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: We envision a future where all AI applications possess excellent 'memory' and 'understanding' capabilities, no longer plagued by 'context rot' or information gaps, becoming truly powerful, intelligent, and trustworthy partners. We hope to become the cornerstone of building high-quality AI applications, making context engineering the core competitiveness of every AI-native company. We firmly believe that through rigorous engineering methods and pursuit of ultimate craftsmanship, we can usher in a new era of more efficient collaboration between AI and humans.

memory.title: Intelligent Context Persistence & Memory Management
memory.description: We provide advanced tools and platforms to help your AI agents efficiently 'write' and persistently store intermediate thoughts, plans, temporary data, and user session summaries and key facts. Whether it's short-term working memory or long-term knowledge accumulation (such as vector databases and knowledge graphs), we ensure information can be retrieved on demand in the future.

retrieval.title: Advanced Context Retrieval & Intelligent Selection
retrieval.description: We build AI-native retrieval infrastructure that transcends traditional keyword matching, combining vector search's semantic understanding, full-text search's keyword matching, and metadata filtering to achieve high-recall rough screening from massive information.

optimization.title: Context Optimization & Efficient Compression
optimization.description: We provide innovative methods to perform lossy or lossless 'compression' of information before it enters the context window, carrying the most core signals with fewer tokens. This includes automatic summarization, history pruning, and other strategies.

architecture.title: Multi-Agent Architectures & Context Isolation
architecture.description: We design and deploy multi-agent architectures that allow sub-agents to work in parallel within their respective domains, digest large amounts of raw information, and then submit only the most critical and refined insights to the main agent.

evaluation.title: Context Quality Evaluation & Generative Benchmarking
evaluation.description: We provide 'generative benchmarking' tools that use large models to generate high-quality Q&A pairs from your private documents in reverse, building 'golden datasets' to help you quantitatively evaluate the performance improvement effects of different embedding models, retrieval strategies, or re-ranking steps.

team.title: Our Team
team.content: Our team consists of AI researchers, software engineers, and industry experts with extensive experience in machine learning, natural language processing, and system architecture. We are passionate about advancing the field of context engineering and helping organizations build more reliable and efficient AI applications.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.content: Ready to transform your AI applications from alchemy to engineering? We'd love to hear from you and discuss how we can help you master the art of context engineering.

introduction.title: Introduction: From AI Alchemy to Engineering
introduction.content: Current AI application development, especially Agent building, is often compared to a mysterious alchemy. Despite advanced technology, many AI Agents frequently fail in actual use, and the root cause is often not insufficient model capabilities, but the failure of context engineering.

whatIsContext.title: What is Context
whatIsContext.definition: Essentially, context is the collection of all information provided to a large language model (LLM) for completing the next reasoning or generation task. It goes far beyond just chat history.

instructional.title: Instructional Context
instructional.description: Guides the model on what to do and how to do it, setting frameworks, goals, and rules for the model's behavior.

informational.title: Informational Context
informational.description: Tells the model what knowledge it needs, providing facts, data, and knowledge necessary for problem-solving.

actionable.title: Actionable Context
actionable.description: Tells the model what it can do and the results after doing it, providing the ability to interact with the external world.

whatIsContextEngineering.title: What is Context Engineering
whatIsContextEngineering.definition: Context engineering is a systematic discipline focused on designing, building, and maintaining a dynamic system responsible for intelligently assembling optimal context combinations for each step of Agent execution, ensuring tasks are completed reliably and efficiently.
whatIsContextEngineering.goal: Its working goal is to decide what information should be placed in the context window for any generation step of the large language model.

contextRot.title: The Harsh Reality of Context Rot
contextRot.description: The capabilities of large models are not immune to the number of tokens in the context window. The more information you stuff into the model's head, the dumber it often becomes.

simpleAccumulation.title: The Pitfalls of Simple Accumulation Strategy
simpleAccumulation.description: In complex and long-term tasks, simply providing all possible contexts to the model not only fails but also reduces model performance.

corePractices.title: Core Practices of Context Engineering Framework

writing.title: Writing
writing.description: Persist context beyond context window limitations for on-demand retrieval in the future.

selection.title: Selection/Retrieval
selection.description: Before each model call, dynamically pull the most relevant information from all available sources.

compression.title: Compression
compression.description: Compress information before entering the context window to accommodate more effective signals within limited capacity.

isolation.title: Isolation
isolation.description: Set boundaries between multi-information streams, allowing sub-processes to digest first and only pass key information.

twoStageRetrieval.title: Two-stage Retrieval
twoStageRetrieval.description: First stage uses semantic similarity to quickly filter from millions of candidates, second stage uses the model itself for re-ranking.

generativeBenchmarking.title: Generative Benchmarking
generativeBenchmarking.description: Let the model read documents and generate user questions to quickly create question-answer pairs.

conclusion.title: Conclusion and Outlook
conclusion.content: The focus of AI application development has irreversibly shifted from finding the perfect prompt to designing a robust and reliable system that can dynamically assemble perfect context at every step.
